title: URF sails off with Party IP in its wake

replies.body: im ok with the small portions, so i nominate... Ultra Rapid Fridays!!!!
Exactly what I was thinking! Have it every week on a certain day!

This would be awesome! I loved playing URF, and they could easily mix a few other game modes in. All random URF would be phenomenal, taking away the largest complaint I have seen: the repetitive champ select. I also wish Riot would show some of the population statistics for URF in comparison to the permanent game modes (normal, Dominion, and ARAM) when using the excuse of "declining engagement and burnout" to justify keeping LoL less fun.
idk what you are talking about i saw a bigger variance of teams on urf than i did in ranked 5s or aram lol
I think the fact that the losing team spends 2/3 of the game waiting to respawn is a bigger problem than repetitive champ select. Bring revive back for URF.
Man I wish they could kick ARAM or Dominon for URF haha. The level of fun on URF is just incomparable.
URF.ascension and hexakill for Friday Saturday and Sunday!
honestly thats an idea worth using. especially because lcs is always on the weekend as well. {{item:1076}}
As I'm reading through the comments asking for urf to become permanent, reflect on this quote: "Don't cry because its over, smile because it happened." - Dr. Seuss
they need to bring back Urf the campian
We need spelling classes in our school systems.
We just need a new school system. SCRAP IT

I met a kid in high school who thought that .5 + .5 = .1 and I asked if he was serious and he said yes... I was just... so astounded at him. I asked him if he would like to correct himself and he said "No no .5 and .5 together make .1" and I informed him that he just cut 9 tenths of it off xD HE STILL DIDN'T GET IT. Schools lack a lot these days. Most people don't know the difference between "your" (Possessive) and "you're" (you are) and it's kinda sad. ._.
Most kids now don't need to know the difference between your and you're because they just call it ur anyway.
Well... back to ARAM.
Well.. back to seeing bring back URF post on very thread.

**1.**"Ultra Rapid Fridays" will be very hard to manage, because there are different time zones in America. Therefore, people will be playing at different times, and this might hold them back from the community interacting all at once. 

**2.**"Featured Gameplay Modes taper off in popularity sharply after a short period of time." URF might be very fun, but it does get unpopular fast if it is available for a long time. In the 10 URF games I've played, I saw the same champions get banned, and picked. The teams aren't original. We see the same champions dominate in the games. This "sameness" will make you tired of it eventually.

**3.**URF started out as an April Fools Joke, with the champion Urf. Because of the community's positive feedback, it has become a gamemode now. So, stop trashing Riot, just because they took out Urf for now. It is very likely it will come back. Riot says, "...and we’ll dive into all of the feedback you’ve given us over the last fourteen days." They wouldn't look at the feedback if they won't open Urf again. So be patient. And **Stop Trashing Riot.**
Can't you just leave URF in custom, is that so much to ask :(

Damn. I got banned the day before U.R.F was released, and unbanned the day after U.R.F ends. The timing is so painful.

Can't say I didn't deserve the ban, but did it HAVE to occur when it did?

That *is* a strange coincidence.

Has anyone ever seen Urf and Jelly Mac in the same room?

LoL is like the stable, moderately attractive girl you hang out with. or guy. either applies. then their hot af friend shows up for two weeks, sweeping you away in this crazy whirlwind, and suddenly you're SO BORED with the first girl. she's nice and all, but this girl is so exciting! but you stick around with that girl in shame, waiting for her to bring back her hot friend. that's basically my opinion on what URF is.
This sounds kinda mean to that girl.

OMG!!!  YOU'RE RIGHT!!!



"I wish my wife's hot friend would come back..."
No more jamming out to the login screen :{
Well, I just finished a game & right away I went to go Q up for URF & it wasn't there anymore. My little heart just shattered {{item:3070}}
Idgaf about U.R.F, HERE I COME 400% IP WEEKEND :D {{champion:11}} {{summoner:6}} {{item:3270}}
{{champion:33}} {{summoner:6}} {{summoner:7}} {{item:3270}}
No, 400% because its bonus ip. With 5 members thats +300% IP, and is added to the initial 100% of IP you get from that game. 100%+300%=400%
Urf was a fun game mode good job riot till next year. :)
Just logged on to League to find that URF is nowhere to be found.  I am lost and utterly confused.  What do I play now? The normal games will never be the same.  I miss my URF =[

I say do away with Dominion and replace it with URF....I mean lets be honest, how many people ACTUALLY play Dominion compared to ANY OTHER game mode out there, especially URF. Come one Riot, make your fans' dreams come true!
you're forgetting about hide and seek
Dominion actually has fans though. I mean, it's one thing to say that it's a small group, but they're still people who love their game.

Honestly the post mentions that URF is best savored in small servings but I feel like it actually is the opposite.  People get in the mood to play it way more often than that but since it's only here for a short time people spam it non-stop and then burn themselves out on it.  If you were to lets say tell us it's going to be permanent ahead of time I think you'd see a burst of play then a steady flow in it.  A fun mode where people don't take it as serious and can learn champs in a faster more interesting way.

I agree 100%. I know I put off other things just so I could cram more URF in during its short stay. I wouldn't dream of touching a normal or ranked game while it was here. 

I think Riot needs more customization for "Custom", and have some URF like settings. It'd be perfect for practicing the game and it'd be interesting to see what else the community would come up with.
I don't know why, but I have an urge to play NURF. Bring Us NURF!!!!

***
{{champion:122}} |{{item:1038}}  Seeing how the "attention" from all the URF madness is soon to be over, maybe just MAYBE , Riot can continue to work on the diagnostics for their ranking system, and possibly stop the purchases of "ELO Boosters" ... personally ive been trying to find out exactly How Many Bronze Players It Takes To Screw In A Light-Bulb, Then I Finally Came To The Conclusion That Bronze Players Couldn't POSSIBLY Screw In A Light-Bulb Because They Can't Even Climb A Ladder To Save Their Own Life
***
Why Do You Talk Like This, It Doesn't Make You Sound Smart Nor Can People Take You Seriously.
I Type Sometimes Like This Simply Cause I'm Too Tired To Think

I Type Like This When I Just Finish Coding And Forget That I'm Talking In Camel Caps, It Turned Into A Habit At Times Because I Code More Often Then Regular Typing. I Know What You Should Be Thinking, "Doesn't Camel Typing Involve One Lower Case Followed By An Upper Case" And You'd Be Right. Sucks That I Have A Hard Time Doing That Now-A-Days.
I petition to turn urf the manatee into urf the ground hog so every time he comes around he will see his shadow and we can have six more weeks of urf =D

wow, im now having URF withdrawls, i played a normal game and fed 3/8... and I HATED IT, the waiting, the feeding, the 5 min game that really last 20(if not longer cause teamates). im the type of feeder that feeds because i want to play the game fully, so i end up dying alot cause i go in all the time. now its back to the grind, the 9-5 XP now i dont feel like playing so much anymore gg. make URF at least in training mode where you can practice your flash and skill shot ranges, etc.
I cant go back to real life now...
for every criticism  i have about the game i love about urf, really.. this game has lost its grip due to the slow pace of it. Please, i dont want to feed, i just want to play the fast pace game i love so much.
and about the "burn out". i played nothing but urf, its my style. and with out it, its just stale and dry, and slow.. X( i cant cry enough over the end of URF, since its my main. now feels like im on nurf, anyways, bye LoL, i got homework, and youre just so boring as you are.
I hope to all sweet fucking Sanity and URF Almighty that you don't play ranked. For all our sakes.
"Featured Gameplay Modes taper off in popularity sharply after a short period of time." Uh-huh, that what you said about aram, yet it's vastly more popular than dominion ever was since it came out.

Riot these party IP boost offers are amazing! ty so much for making them, but can you please make something else that we can buy with IP please? I already bought all the champions available in store, and all the runes and rune pages that i want. im sitting on a lot of ip with nothing else to buy :( of course i'll use some of it on the new champion once she/ he gets released, but besides that i cant buy anything with my ip TT_TT
Loner IP Weekend pls b/c no friends {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Sadly I agree with the "small doses" bit, but I would definitely like featured game modes a little more often.  Repeats are welcome.
You guys said it would be here until the 13th... it's the 13th... and there are still over 14 hours left on the 13th...
